creator: nicolas.mailhot@one2team.com
text:
Hi,

Would it be possible to abstract the configuration part of the /etc/rc.d scripts
in an /etc/tomcat.conf file and mark only this file as a configuration file in
the rpm ? Most /etc/rc.d scripts I know use this approach.

A lot of people have to customize JAVA_HOME but have to wish to change the
scripts themselves, nor have an old version lie on their disks when they upgrade
tomcat because it has been marked as « config »

Thanks,

-- 
Nicolas Mailhot
